title: Is the pain of the heart attack really that bad? - Quora

response.answer_text: It can be so bad, it can kill you! Seriously though, the pain from a heart attacks can range from none at all to the classic “elephant on the chest” with pain radiating down the left arm. I have transported people complaining of indigestion that were having a ‘silent’ heart attack. Our medical direction was to suspect any abdominal pain in women as a possible heart attack Understanding Heart Attack -- the Basics Silent heart attack: What are the risks? 7 Strange and Surprising Heart Attack Symptoms Women Should Not Ignore

I have never had it neither has anyone I have known ever had it. I feel it is that bad because shock is already painful so imagine feeling a strong tightness in your chest that could possibly end your life.
